comments:
When trying to open a sitemap in webtools 1.0, I got this error:

Error 2006-03-09 10:37:05.531 Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.jface".

The sitemap source:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE sitemap
[
 <!ENTITY call-flow SYSTEM "common/sitemap/pipeline-call-flow.xml">
 <!ENTITY view-page SYSTEM "common/sitemap/pipeline-view-page.xml">
 <!ENTITY skin      SYSTEM "common/sitemap/resource-skin.xml">
]>
<map:sitemap xmlns:map="http://apache.org/cocoon/sitemap/1.0">

<!-- Composants suppl?mentaires non pr?sents dans la sitemap racine -->
<map:components>
  <map:actions>
    <map:action name="auth" src="fr.magnus.grc.cocoon.acting.AuthenticateAction"/>
  </map:actions>
  <map:selectors>
    <map:selector name="ajax-request" src="org.apache.cocoon.ajax.AjaxRequestSelector"/>
  </map:selectors>
  <map:transformers default="xslt">
    <map:transformer name="browser-update" src="org.apache.cocoon.ajax.BrowserUpdateTransformer"/>
    <map:transformer name="i18n" src="org.apache.cocoon.transformation.I18nTransformer">
      <catalogues default="forms">
        <catalogue id="forms" name="messages" location="resource://org/apache/cocoon/forms/system/i18n"/>
      </catalogues>
    </map:transformer>
    <map:transformer name="permissions" src="fr.magnus.grc.cocoon.transformation.PermissionFilterTransformer"/>
  </map:transformers>
  <!-- <map:serializers>
   <map:serializer logger="sitemap.serializer.html" mime-type="text/html" name="html" pool-max="32" src="org.apache.cocoon.serialization.HTMLSerializer">
     <doctype-public>-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN</doctype-public>
     <doctype-system>http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd</doctype-system>
     <encoding>UTF-8</encoding>
   </map:serializer>
 </map:serializers> -->
</map:components>

<map:flow>
  <map:script src="common/flow/common.js"/>
  <map:script src="common/flow/flow-utils.js"/>
</map:flow>

<map:resources>
  &skin;
</map:resources>

<map:pipelines>
  <map:pipeline>
  
    <!-- Ressources statiques non authentifi?es (gif, css, js, etc) -->
    <map:match pattern="resources/*/**">
      <map:select type="resource-exists">
        <map:when test="{0}">
          <map:read src="{0}"/>
        </map:when>
        <map:otherwise>
          <map:read src="resource://org/apache/cocoon/{1}/resources/{2}"/>
        </map:otherwise>
      </map:select>
    </map:match>
    
    <!-- On ne passe ? la suite pas si on n'est pas authentifi? (l'action redirige vers la page de login) -->
    <map:act type="auth"/>
    
    <map:match pattern="">
      <map:redirect-to uri="cocoon:/view_accueil.html"/>
    </map:match>
    
    <map:match pattern="navigation">
      <map:generate type="xpathdirectory" src="metiers">
        <map:parameter name="depth" value="2"/>
        <map:parameter name="exclude" value="CVS"/>
      </map:generate>
      <map:transform src="resources/dir2navigation.xsl">
        <map:parameter name="context-path" value="{request:contextPath}"/>
      </map:transform>
      <!-- On filtre la navigation par les permissions -->
      <map:transform type="permissions">
        <map:parameter name="keep-elements" value="true"/>
      </map:transform>
      <map:serialize type="xml"/>
    </map:match>
    
    &call-flow;
    
    &view-page;
    
    <map:match pattern="*/**">
      <map:mount src="metiers/{1}/{1}.xmap" uri-prefix="{1}"/>
    </map:match>
  </map:pipeline>

</map:pipelines>

</map:sitemap>
